00030         public function process() {
00031                 
00032                 //read global settings
00033                 session_start();
00034                 $settings = $this->getSettings();
00035                 
00036                 //set GET/POST parameters
00037                 $this->gp = array_merge(t3lib_div::_GET(), t3lib_div::_POST());
00038                 if($settings['formValuesPrefix']) {
00039                         $this->gp = $this->gp[$settings['formValuesPrefix']];
00040                         $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['formValuesPrefix'] = $settings['formValuesPrefix'];
00041                 }
00042                 
00043                 $this->mergeGPWithSession();
00044                 
00045                 //set debug mode
00046                 $this->debugMode = ($settings['debug'] == "1")?TRUE:FALSE;
00047                 $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['debugMode'] = $this->debugMode;
00048                 
00049                 //find current step
00050                 if(isset($this->gp) && is_array($this->gp)) {
00051                         $highest = 0;
00052                         foreach (array_keys($this->gp) as $pname) {
00053                                 
00054                                 if (strstr($pname,'step-')) {
00055                                         $mpPage = substr($pname,strpos($pname,'step-'),6);
00056                                         
00057                                         if (strpos($mpPage, '-')) {
00058                                                 $mpPage = substr($mpPage,strrpos ($mpPage, '-')+1);
00059                                         } //if end
00060                                         
00061                                         if(intVal($mpPage) > $highest) {
00062                                                 $highest = intVal($mpPage);
00063                                         }
00064                                 } // if end
00065                         } // foreach end
00066                         $this->currentStep = $highest;
00067                 }
00068                 if(!$this->currentStep) {
00069                         $this->currentStep = 1;
00070                 }
00071                 
00072                 //set last step
00073                 $this->lastStep = $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['currentStep'];
00074                 if(!$this->lastStep) {
00075                         $this->lastStep = 1;
00076                 }
00077                 
00078                 //find total step count
00079                 $stepCount = 0;
00080                 foreach($settings as $step=>$options) {
00081                         if(is_numeric($step)) {
00082                                 $stepCount ++;
00083                         }
00084                 }
00085                 $this->totalSteps = $stepCount;
00086                 
00087                 //merge settings with specific settings for current step
00088                 if(isset($settings[$this->currentStep."."]) && is_array($settings[$this->currentStep."."])) {
00089                         $settings = array_merge($settings,$settings[$this->currentStep."."]);
00090                 }
00091                 
00092                 //set debug mode again. Maybe it is turned off for this step
00093                 $this->debugMode = ($settings['debug'] == "1")?TRUE:FALSE;
00094                 $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['debugMode'] = $this->debugMode;
00095                 
00096                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage("Using controller \"F3_MailformPlusPlus_Controller_Default\"");
00097                 
00098                 //store step values in session
00099                 $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['settings'] = $settings;
00100                 $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['currentStep'] = $this->currentStep;
00101                 $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['lastStep'] = $this->lastStep;
00102                 $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['totalSteps'] = $this->totalSteps;
00103                 
00104                 $disableErrorChecks = false;
00105                 if($this->currentStep == $this->lastStep) {
00106                         $disableErrorChecks = true;
00107                 }
00108                 
00109                 //add some JavaScript for fancy form stuff
00110                 $this->addSpecialJS($settings);
00111                 
00112                 //set submitted
00113                 $submitted = $this->gp['submitted'];
00114                 
00115                 //read template file
00116                 if(!$this->templateFile) {
00117                         $templateFile = $settings['templateFile'];
00118                         if(isset($settings['templateFile.']) && is_array($settings['templateFile.'])) {
00119                                 $this->templateFile = $this->cObj->cObjGetSingle($settings['templateFile'],$settings['templateFile.']);
00120                         } else {
00121                                 $this->templateFile = t3lib_div::getURL(F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::resolvePath($templateFile));
00122                         }
00123                 }
00124                 
00125                 if(!$this->templateFile) {
00126                         F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage("Could not find template file");
00127                 }
00128                 
00129                 //set stylesheet file
00130                 $stylesheetFile = $settings['stylesheetFile'];
00131                 if ($stylesheetFile != "") {
00132                         
00133                         //set stylesheet
00134                         $GLOBALS['TSFE']->additionalHeaderData['special_css'] .= 
00135                                 '<link rel="stylesheet" href="'.F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::resolveRelPathFromSiteRoot($stylesheetFile).'" type="text/css" media="screen" />';
00136                 }
00137                 
00138                 //init view
00139                 $viewClass = $settings['view'];
00140                 if(!$viewClass) {
00141                         $viewClass = "F3_MailformPlusPlus_View_Multistep";
00142                 }
00143                 $view = $this->componentManager->getComponent($viewClass);
00144                 $view->setLangFile($this->langFile);
00145                 $this->setViewSubpart($view,$settings,$this->currentStep);
00146                 
00147                 if($this->finished) {
00148                         F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage("Form is finished!");
00149                 }
00150                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage("Using view \"".$viewClass."\"");
00151                 
00152                 $errors = array();
00153                 
00154                 //if not submitted
00155                 if(!$submitted) {
00156                         
00157                         //clear session variables
00158                         $this->clearSession();
00159                         
00160                         $this->gp = array();
00161                         
00162                         //clear uploaded files in temp folder if configured
00163                         $this->clearTempFiles($settings['files.']['clearTempFilesOlderThanHours']);
00164                         
00165                         //run preProcessors
00166                         if(isset($settings['preProcessors.']) && is_array($settings['preProcessors.'])) {
00167                                 $this->runClasses($settings['preProcessors.']);
00168                         }
00169                         
00170                         //run init interceptors
00171                         if(isset($settings['initInterceptors.']) && is_array($settings['initInterceptors.'])) {
00172                                 $this->runClasses($settings['initInterceptors.']);
00173                         }
00174                         
00175                         //debug GET/POST parameters
00176                         if(is_array($this->gp) && $this->debugMode) {
00177                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage("The current GET/POST values:<br />",false);
00178                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugArray($this->gp);
00179                         }
00180                                 
00181                         //display form
00182                         return $view->render($this->gp,$errors);
00183                         
00184                 //if submitted
00185                 } else {
00186                         
00187                         //save settings because they have to be changed for error validation
00188                         $oldSettings = $settings;
00189                         
00190                         //run init interceptors
00191                         if(isset($settings['initInterceptors.']) && is_array($settings['initInterceptors.'])  && !$_SESSION['submitted_ok']) {
00192                                 $this->runClasses($settings['initInterceptors.']);
00193                         }
00194                         
00195                         //debug GET/POST parameters
00196                         if(isset($this->gp) && is_array($this->gp) && $this->debugMode) {
00197                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage("The current GET/POST values:<br />",false);
00198                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugArray($this->gp);
00199                         }
00200                         
00201                         //load settings from right step for error checks, ...
00202                         if($this->currentStep > $this->lastStep) {
00203                                 $settings = $this->getSettings();
00204                                 if(is_array($settings[($this->currentStep-1)."."])) {
00205                                         $settings = array_merge($settings,$settings[($this->currentStep-1).'.']);
00206                                 }
00207                                 $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['settings'] = $settings;
00208                         }
00209                         
00210                         //run validation
00211                         $valid = array(true);
00212                         if(isset($settings['validators.']) && is_array($settings['validators.'])  && !$_SESSION['submitted_ok'] && !$disableErrorChecks) {
00213                                 foreach($settings['validators.'] as $tsConfig) {
00214                                         F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage("Calling Validator: ".$tsConfig['class']);
00215                                         $validator = $this->componentManager->getComponent($tsConfig['class']);
00216                                         
00217                                         //add requiredFields settings from plugin record, if class is the default validator or a subclass.
00218                                         if((is_a($validator,"F3_MailformPlusPlus_Validator_Default") || is_subclass_of($validator,"F3_MailformPlusPlus_Validator_Default")) && is_array($this->requiredFields)) {
00219                                                 $tsConfig['config.']['requiredFields'] = $this->requiredFields;
00220                                         }
00221                                         $res = $validator->validate($this->gp,$tsConfig['config.'],$errors);
00222                                         array_push($valid,$res);
00223                                 }
00224                         }
00225                         
00226                         //set settings back to current step settings because validation is over
00227                         $settings = $oldSettings;
00228                         $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['settings'] = $settings;
00229                         
00230                         //if form is valid
00231                         if($this->isValid($valid)) {
00232                                 #unset($this->gp['step-'.$this->currentStep]);
00233                                 if(!$_SESSION['submitted_ok']) {
00234                                         $this->processFiles();
00235                                 }
00236                                 
00237                                 //if no more steps
00238                                 if($this->finished) {
00239                                         
00240                                         
00241                                         //merge SESSION parameters and GET/POST parameters
00242                                         if(!is_array($this->gp)) {
00243                                                 $this->gp = array();
00244                                         }
00245                                 #       if(!is_array($_SESSION['mailformplusplusValues'])) {
00246                                 #               $_SESSION['mailformplusplusValues'] = array();
00247                                         #}
00248                                         #$this->gp = array_merge($this->gp,$_SESSION['mailformplusplusValues']);
00249                                         
00250                                         //run save interceptors
00251                                         if(isset($settings['saveInterceptors.']) && is_array($settings['saveInterceptors.']) && !$_SESSION['submitted_ok']) {
00252                                                 $this->runClasses($settings['saveInterceptors.']);
00253                                         }
00254                                         
00255                                         //run loggers
00256                                         if(isset($settings['loggers.']) && is_array($settings['loggers.']) && !$_SESSION['submitted_ok']) {
00257                                                 foreach($settings['loggers.'] as $tsConfig) {
00258                                                         F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage("Calling Logger: ".$tsConfig['class']);
00259                                                         $logger = $this->componentManager->getComponent($tsConfig['class']);
00260                                                         $logger->log($this->gp,$tsConfig['config.']);
00261                                                 }
00262                                         }
00263                                         
00264                                         //run finishers
00265                                         if(isset($settings['finishers.']) && is_array($settings['finishers.'])) {
00266                                                 foreach($settings['finishers.'] as $tsConfig) {
00267                                                         $finisher = $this->componentManager->getComponent($tsConfig['class']);
00268                                                         
00269                                                         //check if the form was finished before. This flag is set by the F3_Finisher_Confirmation
00270                                                         if(!$_SESSION['submitted_ok']) {
00271                                                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage("Calling Finisher: ".$tsConfig['class']);
00272                                                                 
00273                                                                 $tsConfig['config.']['templateFile'] = $settings['templateFile'];
00274                                                                 $tsConfig['config.']['langFile'] = $settings['langFile'];
00275                                                                 $tsConfig['config.']['formValuesPrefix'] = $settings['formValuesPrefix'];
00276                                                                 
00277                                                                 //if the finisher returns HTML (e.g. F3_MailformPlusPlus_Finisher_Confirmation)
00278                                                                 if($tsConfig['config.']['returns']) {
00279                                                                         return $finisher->process($this->gp,$tsConfig['config.']);                      
00280                                                                 } else {
00281                                                                         
00282                                                                         //add email settings from plugin record if the finisher is the mail finisher or a subclass
00283                                                                         if((is_a($finisher,"F3_MailformPlusPlus_Finisher_Mail") || is_subclass_of($finisher,"F3_MailformPlusPlus_Finisher_Mail"))) {
00284                                                                                 $finisher->setEmailSettings($this->emailSettings);
00285                                                                                 
00286                                                                         //add redirect settings from plugin record if the finisher is the recirect finisher or a subclass
00287                                                                         } elseif((is_a($finisher,"F3_MailformPlusPlus_Finisher_Redirect") || is_subclass_of($finisher,"F3_MailformPlusPlus_Finisher_Redirect"))) {
00288                                                                                 if(strlen($this->redirectPage) > 0) {
00289                                                                                         $tsConfig['config.']['redirect_page'] = $this->redirectPage; 
00290                                                                                 }
00291                                                                         }
00292                                                                         $this->gp = $finisher->process($this->gp,$tsConfig['config.']);
00293                                                                 }
00294                                                                 
00295                                                         //if the form was finished before, only show the output of the F3_MailformPlusPlus_Finisher_Confirmation
00296                                                         } elseif((is_a($finisher,"F3_MailformPlusPlus_Finisher_Confirmation") || is_subclass_of($finisher,"F3_MailformPlusPlus_Finisher_Confirmation"))) {
00297                                                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage("Calling Finisher: ".$tsConfig['class']);
00298                                                                 $finisher = $this->componentManager->getComponent($tsConfig['class']);
00299                                                                 $tsConfig['config.']['templateFile'] = $settings['templateFile'];
00300                                                                 $tsConfig['config.']['langFile'] = $settings['langFile'];
00301                                                                 $tsConfig['config.']['formValuesPrefix'] = $settings['formValuesPrefix'];
00302                                                                 return $finisher->process($this->gp,$tsConfig['config.']);
00303                                                         }
00304                                                 }
00305                                         }
00306                                 
00307                                 //form is not finished, render next step
00308                                 } else {
00309                                         
00310                                         //if user clicked "submit"
00311                                         if($this->currentStep >= $this->lastStep) {
00312                                                 $this->storeGPinSession($settings);
00313                                         }
00314                                         
00315                                         //display form
00316                                         return $view->render($this->gp,$errors);
00317                                 }
00318                                 
00319                                 //not returned, but finished. What to do?
00320                                 
00321                         //if form is not valid
00322                         } else {
00323                                 
00324                                 //stay on current step
00325                                 if($this->lastStep < $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['currentStep']) {
00326                                         $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['currentStep']--;
00327                                 }
00328                                 
00329                                 //load settings from last step again because an error occurred
00330                                 #$settings = $this->getSettings();
00331                                 #if(is_array($settings[($this->currentStep-1)."."])) {
00332                         #               $settings = array_merge($settings,$settings[($this->currentStep-1).'.']);
00333                         #       }
00334                 #               $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['settings'] = $settings;
00335                 
00336                                 if($this->currentStep > $this->lastStep) {
00337                                         $settings = $this->getSettings();
00338                                         if(isset($settings[($this->currentStep-1)."."]) && is_array($settings[($this->currentStep-1)."."])) {
00339                                                 $settings = array_merge($settings,$settings[($this->currentStep-1).'.']);
00340                                         }
00341                                         $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['settings'] = $settings;
00342                                 }
00343                 
00344                                 
00345                                 //reset the template because step had probably been decreased
00346                                 $this->setViewSubpart($view,$settings,($this->currentStep-1));
00347                                 
00348                                 //show form with errors
00349                                 #print get_class($view);
00350                                 return $view->render($this->gp,$errors);
00351                         }
00352                 }
00353                 
00354                 
00355         }

00368         protected function setViewSubpart(&$view,&$settings,$step) {
00369                 $this->finished = 0;
00370                 
00371                 //search for ###TEMPLATE_FORM[step][suffix]###
00372                 if(strstr($this->templateFile,"###TEMPLATE_FORM".$step.$settings['templateSuffix']."###")) {
00373                         F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage("Using subpart \"###TEMPLATE_FORM".$step.$settings['templateSuffix']."###\"");
00374                         $view->setTemplate($this->templateFile, 'FORM'.$step.$settings['templateSuffix']);
00375                         
00376                 //search for ###TEMPLATE_FORM[step]###
00377                 } elseif(strstr($this->templateFile,"###TEMPLATE_FORM".$step."###")) {
00378                         F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage("Using subpart \"###TEMPLATE_FORM".$step."###\"");
00379                         $view->setTemplate($this->templateFile, 'FORM'.$step);
00380                         
00381                 //search for ###TEMPLATE_FORM###
00382                 } elseif(strstr($this->templateFile,"###TEMPLATE_FORM###")) {
00383                         F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage("Using subpart \"###TEMPLATE_FORM###\"");
00384                         $view->setTemplate($this->templateFile, 'FORM');
00385                         
00386                 //mark form as finished
00387                 } else {
00388                         
00389                         $this->finished = 1;
00390                 }
00391         }
00392         
00399         protected function mergeGPWithSession() {
00400                 session_start();
00401                 if(!is_array($this->gp)) {
00402                         $this->gp = array();
00403                 }
00404                 if(!is_array($_SESSION['mailformplusplusValues'])) {
00405                         $_SESSION['mailformplusplusValues'] = array();
00406                 }
00407                 
00408                 foreach($_SESSION['mailformplusplusValues'] as $step=>&$params) {
00409                         if(is_array($params)) {
00410                                 unset($params['submitted']);
00411                                 if($step != $this->currentStep) {
00412                                         foreach($params as $key=>$value) {
00413                                                 $this->gp[$key] = $value;
00414                                         }
00415                                 }
00416                         }
00417                 }
00418         }
00419         
00427         protected function storeGPinSession(&$settings) {
00428                 session_start();
00429                 
00430                 //merge GET/POST again to get a third version of submitted values.
00431                 //the values in $this->gp are not reliable because they got merged with $_SESSION in initPreProcessor
00432                 $newGP = array_merge(t3lib_div::_GET(), t3lib_div::_POST());
00433                 if($_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['settings']['formValuesPrefix']) {
00434                         $newGP = $newGP[$_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['settings']['formValuesPrefix']];
00435                 }
00436                 
00437                 //set the variables in session
00438                 foreach($newGP as $key=>$value) {
00439                         if(!strstr($key,"step-") && !strstr($key,"submitted")) {
00440                                 #$_SESSION['mailformplusplusValues'][$key] = $value;
00441                                 $_SESSION['mailformplusplusValues'][$this->currentStep-1][$key] = $value;
00442                         }
00443                 }
00444                 
00445                 //check for checkbox and radiobutton fields using the values in $newGP
00446                 if($settings['checkBoxFields']) {
00447                         $fields = t3lib_div::trimExplode(",",$settings['checkBoxFields']);
00448                         foreach($fields as $field) {
00449                                 if(!isset($newGP[$field]) && isset($this->gp[$field])) {
00450                                         #$_SESSION['mailformplusplusValues'][][$field] = array();
00451                                         $_SESSION['mailformplusplusValues'][$this->currentStep-1][$field] = array();
00452                                 }
00453                         }
00454                 }
00455                 if($settings['radioButtonFields']) {
00456                         $fields = t3lib_div::trimExplode(",",$settings['checkBoxFields']);
00457                         foreach($fields as $field) {
00458                                 if(!isset($newGP[$field]) && isset($this->gp[$field])) {
00459                                         #$_SESSION['mailformplusplusValues'][$field] = "";
00460                                         $_SESSION['mailformplusplusValues'][$this->currentStep-1][$field] = array();
00461                                 }
00462                         }
00463                 }
00464         }
